description: Try our easy to follow Bread & Butter Cucumber Pickles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bread & Butter Cucumber Pickles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer cucumber and liquid to 2 x 2 1/2-cup capacity sterilised jars packing to 1cm below top of jars, but not packing too firmly. The liquid needs to coat every slice. Seal and store in cool, dark area for up to 6 months.
